AndesBiodiversite 0.1.0

    • Format des données

Create a WKT linestring from two points This function creates a WKT (Well-Known Text) representation of a linestring connecting two points. Each point is represented as a list containing 'lon' and 'lat' fields, and optionally a 'z' field for elevation (a negative number representing depth).

linestring_wkt.Rd

Create a WKT linestring from two points This function creates a WKT (Well-Known Text) representation of a linestring connecting two points. Each point is represented as a list containing 'lon' and 'lat' fields, and optionally a 'z' field for elevation (a negative number representing depth).

Usage

linestring_wkt(p1, p2, fmt = 3)

Arguments

p1

A list with 'lon' and 'lat' (and optionally 'z') fields for the first point

p2

A list with 'lon' and 'lat' (and optionally 'z') fields for the second point

defing this here instead of using the package sf to avoid dependency If we ever import sf or wellknown, we can replace this function
